p: Cell cycle arrest analysis was conducted to evaluate the role of TCEO in cell death. It is well known that cell cycle control represents an important regulatory mechanism for cell growth, and that disorganization in cell cycles lead to tumorigeneses ( Golias et al., 2004). Indeed, it has been documented that several EO from different plants have exerted cell death through cell cycles disruption ( Singh et al., 2002, Saleh et al., 2017). Here, we mentioned that TCEO exerted G1 cell cycle arrest in MCF-7 cells. This sort of cell cycle arrest at G1 phase has been described for essential oils ( Cai et al., 2013, Chung et al., 2019).
